Quality is AAA, 20% THC, from BC and well basically it’s good shit
Comparing to the stats here, i wouldn’t say it has a pineapple or overly sweet taste but def some subtle sourness to it and a mellow earthy undertone to it that’s quite pleasant blended with the sour part

I love the buzz cause it’s definitely not too overwhelming like some indicas or hybrids when yo...”
“One of the best mind highs ever. Took this bud after a night out , such a relaxing bud. Mind is at ease 🌛”

“The scent is unique. Sweet yet very very woody too. Almost smelled like mango and strong-scented wood. The hit is somewhat clean and very noticeable upon exhaling smoke. I give this strain 3/5 because of the taste and high. The high is pretty energetic and somewhat uplifting but with a heavy crash. Not in my top 5 but an ok strain in my opinion.”
“Smooth High”
“One of my favorite Strains”
“Beautiful buds and good citrus flavor.  Definitely a bucket list strain.  Super lifted high with the munchies.”
“Best strain I’ve had so far.”

“Outstanding strain! Happy, relaxed and fun. 
Fantastic flavor (if you like pineapple).
All time favorite Sativa.”

“Very good strain ! Really potent and the high is extraordinary, a nice energetic headbuzz that make you happy! So roll yourself a big fat cone of that good good, put some music on and surf the wave to that tropical feeling !🤙”

“I haven't had Maui Wowie since Duran Duran was a chart topping band, so that would put things around 1983 or so. Today's strain is much more potent when compared to that of 35 years ago.  Not much to report on the flavor but I'm going to vape it next rather than smoke it. A very cerebral high which gives you the capacity to think the deepest of thoughts and solve geo-political puzzles such as middle eastern peace or ...”

“Tried my vaporizer for the second time. Filled 1/4 of the chamber, maybe 1/8 gram.
Used to one-hitters.
Woahhhhhh woushhhhh!!!!
I can hallucinate music!”

“This is one of the best strains for depression and stress, it's really uplifts you. Makes you feel good about everything, definitely raises confidence and motivation. It wasn't racy at all. It's tastes amazing! Sweet, fruity, I love its strong pineapple scent.”

“I first tried this strain on a hot california afternoon in early summer. This strain gave me incredible energy and focus while I was skateboarding(i don't really skate lol) but I was trying to get down these small stairs and I tried for a whole hour straight without feeling like I was too tired. I had an unlimited reserve of energy and focus. I even fell a bunch and didnt care. It was like a trance almost.”
“A new favourite. Mellow. Good for anxiety, stress. Uplifting. Not too heady, but not a body lock, either. Maybe not a daytime but a functional nighttime smoke.”
“My first ever review so why not make it on this awesome strain! It truly lives up to all I’ve read about it. This one will be a regular for sure!”
“Great daytime strain.  Gardening, housecleaning, lawn mowing... You got a lot to do- this is the strain for you.”

“I'm going to give it a 4-star because, for all I know, it could be the product and not the strain for why I'm not much of a fan of Maui Wowie. I have Bipolar 1 and depression and anxiety, and I've been hitting a low that has severely hindered my daily motivation with stuff around my house. I also have fibromyalgia, so I also deal with a lot of daily chronic pain. While Maui Wowie succeeds really well in giving me the...”
“Fat nugs hella red hairs. Crispy and sticky. Smelt like lemon zest. It felt has if my whole body was behind my eye lids. Felt super heady yet chill and lazy.”

“Got Maui Wowie from a collective I like. Recommended by the bud tender. Looks good and I can tell it’s high quality, but every time I’ve smoked it it’s just been... I don’t know... disappointing? I know it’s not just my mood because I’ve gone from smoking one strain to this in the same evening and this never fails to change my mood for the worse. I find this strange for a sativa. Not sure if anyone else has had this ...”

“tldr: Amazing high. you feel positive and happy and confident and you're much more kind to yourself. also giggles.

long:
I'm a new smoker, and I've had anxiety from smoking in the past, so I'm being very cautious as I get high now, I usually take a few tokes from a joint and put it out. I smoked more than I usually do with this strain and I realised I was way way too high, but even when I was too high it wasnt uncom...”
“The strain is amazing. Anxiety lifted and replaced with motivation and positivity.  This particular batch however was harsh, didnt come from the best source and burned really black and oily...”

“Not sure if Mango Maui Wowie is the same - but I highly recommend this strain! Instantly lifted my nausea caused by hormones. If you struggle with nausea due to periods, or side effects of your birth control - I recommend trying this strain out. Just one big hit and you’re good to go for the next 3 hours. Works better than any over the counter medicine I’ve tried.”
“Une de mes sortes favorites très très bon goût fruité j’ai étudié 5 heures non stop après 2 bowl jadore”
“Relaxed, yet anxious at the same time”
“help me sleep very well”

“I was offered the chance to try this strain by a 60 year old lady I met at a music festival. She was an artisan dog collar business owner visiting from Hawaii, and repeatedly assured me, It's called Maui Wowie
column4: and it's some good shit." I trusted her completely.

column1: We both had been waiting literally all day in the same spot near the front of the stage just to see Stevie Wonder
column3: who was headl...”"

“Honestly I’m so fucking baked after smoking two fatass blunts, I don’t even want to do this review. This weed is so so strong (if you happen to have a good source). I haven’t been this high in a long time. I rolled up 2.5g in a Backwoods and I finished it about 20 minutes ago. My body is super relaxed and the head high is amazing, I’ll definitely be smoking this again.”

“Pretty good strain. Smoked around an eighth of this strain over the past couple weeks and my review is mostly posotive. First thing you will notice is how pungent this strain is. As soon as you light it up, you will be able to smell it. I would describe it as a sweet minty smell. The high is good and lasts for around 3 hours. One of the negatives is most times when I come down, it really hits you hard.  Not as smooth...”

“It’s amazing. My first time with it I was feeling like if I was in a movie. After it’s only happyness. Something really bad can happen and you would keep smiling. I recommand it to everyone that want to have a good vibe during difficult time.”
“By far a big favorite , I’m focused alert  and cerebral and lifted A+”

“This batch smells and tastes like cheese and bubblegum. Smokes sooo smooth and creamy. 
Fuckn fantastic.”

“She's quite the looker and tastes just like she smells... tropical fruit and pine!
🌴🍍🍌🌲🤓”
“I love the aroma,  the taste, everything about it. Best strain I've had in a while, really changes your mood.”
“One of my favourite strains perfect for socializing”
“Very uplifting, has a sweet taste”
“A little mild for me @ 19.47% but got me nice and mellow”

“The strain definitely lives up to its name sake, after the first hit you’ll be saying WOW!! An excellent fruity taste that will linger in your mouth long after smoking. Smooth non hard hitting strain that’s great for novice smokers. As someone with Panic Attacks, Anxiety, and Bipolar I strongly suggest giving this a shot.”

“My favorite strain by far! Super smooth smoke, doesn’t hit too hard. The perfect body high rushes over you and you literally feel anxiety and tension dissolve away. It helps me be super happy and productive at the same time. The perfect strain!”
“It's not a horrible taste in your mouth. it leaves me feeling clear headed and energetic. I'm more motivated to accomplish tasks I set out to do.”
“Tres chill. Next best thing to bring on the beach.”

“I don’t often run into this strain so I was happy to see it in my local shop. I know now why I always come back. Just enough sativa kick to get the mind thinking clearly but with a tropical taste and vacation-mode relaxing effects.”

“Tasted slightly like browned butter and coconut to me. When the high hit, I felt like I was either shrinking or everything around me was getting bigger. It was cool. Super happy, just wanted to keep smiling like the joker, ended up dancing. A little bit of dry mouth, but not too bad.”
“Smells like dank food, only have come across this highly dank bud once”
“Only got to smoke a gram but put me on the moon. Wanted to hang out with the boys and just wrestle”
“I'm new to all of this. It made me sleepy”
“Wowieee this is intense”
“A nice creative high. Have in oil form and really enjoying it.  Really nice mellow high that slowly takes over.”
“man, good vibe! mind is working but really relaxed! really digging music!”
“Very happy feeling sweet enticing strain great for vacation weed”
“Best one for me so far, actually....I’m stuck between this and strawberry cough”
“Got a free sample of this & it was tha bomb!!!! Had Me Horny af to.”
“One of my all time favorites. Great for day or night use. Fantastic for depression and anxiety. Definitely helps creativity as well. The taste is a huge bonus too.”

“Grabbed some by Luckys in WA. Hard to give a good review with low shelf product but here we go. Looks like plant material pulled out of a compost heap. Terrible. Smells like tropical fruit and a hint of dried grass. Taste is harsh and herbal, no fruit aroma comes through. Effects are light. Uplifted and happy. Not to much going on, pretty disappointed. I will definitely avoid this cut again and look for a Maui wowie ...”
“I would not say it was my most favorite weed ever but it is number one on my sativa list so far”

“Love at First Smoke.

Seriously, It's called Wowie for a reason.

I am a big Sativa fan, Maui Wowie is the strain if you need a good, mentally clear, energetic focus. The concentration it provides while remaining clear and lucid are very nice. 

Listening to music and cooking with friends all while taking a few hits from a nice glass pipe filled with 17-19% THC Maui is a great night.   

A good social strain.

 This ...”

“awesome. just strong enough to take the edge off, help with stress and anger, but not overly strong. somewhat of an energized feeling, too, which is nice when I have a lot to do. only bad part is my eyes get very dry and bloodshot, more than usual”
“A good, hypnotizing high that makes you feel euphoric at first, then an hour or so into it, makes you crave food...”

“Maui Waui is one of the finest plants I ever had the pleasure to vaporize! The first thing you notice is the fragrance. It's strong, but intoxicating. The second is the feel, the buds are light green/brown in color and incredibly sticky. Third, and most important is the high. To put it rather simply This s**t will get you really high!". And it's quite the wonderful high (more happy/less paranoid).”"
“The sample I had was pretty lifeless.”

“The taste was remarkable nor did it taste like it smelled.  A subtle musk that's fruity but not like berries with a spicy undertone. Smooth drags with little to no coughing throughout test group. Bright green buds with bright sunset pallet hairs, that fispksy nicely in corked glass jars.


Preferred delivery method: water pipe, or bubbler”
“Great flavor vaporized. More distinct and unique than others. Great high and taste.”
“Nice smooth flavor with medium resin and really pungent smell, I liked it”
“Very earthy, but I don`t think I`ll buy again.  Too bad because I first tried this in high school, way back when, and man was it nice:-)”

“I’ve been on a bit of a tropical themed run here as of late, and Maui Wowie, often seen as Maui Waui, adds to this ongoing motif.  After enduring a month in frigid Chicago and getting to know the term polar vortex well, I’ve been spending as much time under the palm trees of SoCal as possible.  It isn’t the taste, but the spirit of this strain that makes me think of warm, sunny beaches and bathing suits.

These buds ...”
“it made me contimplate my life decisions multiple times but got me higher than a mother fucker.”
“I miss living on Oahu and this being so readily available! Good stuff.”

“Maui Wowie Nō ka ʻOi
(Maui Wowie is the best)”

“Awesome strain to relax and get things done. Doesn't get you stoned it gets you high, you get more creative and euphoric but with a relaxing buzz. Helps with stress and anxiety as well as depression, if you have any problems or stress it really helps put things into perspective”

“Loved this strain and boy does is STANK. At first I smelled pungent fruit, but the more I'm around it the more it smells like either a really nasty BM or black licorice. Just all sorts of funk. The high is great, just wish the quality of the bag I got was better.”
“Impressive all around as sativas go, just wish the effects had a bit more longevity. :)”

“The high was a definite. If you smoke this strain you will get high. There are also addititives to the high. Immense Paranoia and a huge fucking headache when you are coming down from it. Maui Waui is up for a second try, but don't see anything changing. #420 #StayHigh”
“the taste is boooomb”
“All I want to do is smile, daydream, and be with friends. This sums up the strain for me. Great stuff.”
“Absolutly The Best! Like Eating a Maui Papaya.”

“Very quick to hit a relaxed feeling.
Taste is not harsh kind of smooth.
Very much a head effect, but pain relief is very high.”
“I didn't really enjoy the high it gave me.”

“Second time trying this strain, from separate dispensaries and months apart. STILL one of my favorite strains. The tropical mix of floral and sweet citruses are alluring. The body buzz is nice and strong, the cheerful mood is perfect after a tough day.”
“It makes the day have no worries😍”
“It has a delicious”
“This is the best maui waui!! It helps all my back pain and insomnia...thank you and I will be back for more!”
“Gets me so... happy . I'll never forget my first time getting high with maui waui.”

“This was my first time smoking this strain. So far, so great! I purchased a half gram from Dab Society, 60% THC. Nice clear light golden brown color. Hits nice and light, fruity in flavor. It gave me a nice high, I feel productive, upbeat, and happy. Do have quite the cotton mouth, but nothing a glass of water can't fix. A++ Strain 👌👌”

“I would have enjoyed this concentrate more if it weren't underpurged.  There is a clear bitter after taste and is a bit chemical infused.   Did not look, or smell underpurged, so very deceptive.  Didn't give it 1 star since I've had far worse wax in the past, but would not recommend.  Picked up at Tetra Health Center in San Jose”
“I was stoked to get my mitts on this one but unfortunately I was disappointed. I expected more happiness.”
“Es una belleza de planta, excelente sabor y el colocon esta duro.”
“So sweet and tasty. Trying different methods smoking this is fun”
“Does anybody know anyone who sells this majestic bud in sierra vista please help me out i would love to buy a 1/4”

“If you get the real stuff, this is a cougher. Notably thick smoke because the buds are so condensed. Almost no shake. Great economy bud because it gets you high quicker. Look for bright green with dark spots and bright red trichomes.”
“Pretty rad. Made me happy”
“Great classic strain.  Nice effects and very long lasting.  Part of me wanted to take a shower and part of me wanted to go to bed.  I did both.”
“Although the buzz didn't last long, the trip was worth it.”

“Maui Waui feels like a Classic: clean, clear (-ish) buzz that greases stress and slides it to the side. I enjoyed blending this flower with other herbs so i will review again, discreetly. *Health & Harmony”

“Well being from the Southwest in America our selection is limited unless you purchase from dispensaries in Colorado so when I heard about this little guy in town I had to give it a try. Maui Waui is a great head high! I felt very relaxed and ease of mind after just a few hits. I also didn't believe a strain could taste or smell tropical" but I swear could smell warm salty air and taste coconuts? This strain definite...”"
“This will knock you out haha. Smoked 2 blunts with 6 people and we all crashed”
“First time Trying maui wowie.  its a great sativa, focused while playing my video games. (league of legends) very fun to relax and hang out with. Would Recommend!!!”
“Smells great! Great for daytime. Keeps you focused.”
“U didd”

“I've Herd a lot about this Strain and when I medicated with it I was not Let down Great Taste and after the 5 th hit I was on the Beaches of Maui ! I'm a Indica Person who  was sold on this Awesome Strain !”
“definitely in my top 10”

“Pleasent as all hell! Very uplifting as
a well as a functional smoke.”
“It's great for kid kudi, but not good for a high tolerance. I smoked it way too fast.”
“Nice, long lasting high. Very relaxing chill" effect. Dense and flavorful. An easy favorite.”"

“I'm not normally a sativa fan, but this stuff is top notch. I feel happy, relaxed, and in the mood to go for a walk or interact with friends. It lacked the head buzz which turns me off to many sativas. This is quite possibly my favorite sativa and definitely in my top 5 overall.”
“I want to love this strain.  The high is quick and heavy and very THERE.  Wait a short time, though, and you're left feeling kinda out of it.  Not tired, really, more like, Eh
column4: do I really want to get up and get some water right now?  Naw
column6: or someone comes to the door
column7: then I'll get up."  I don't like highs that drop like that. Especially when the high doesn't last much longer than a head ...”"

column3: “The WOW factor is legit. This was a tropical smelling densely packed skinny bud and it was perfect for artists or creative types, as well as anyone else. Uplifting, energetic, creativity...the works. Tasted and smelled so good!”
“Maui Woui is just one of those strains that never gets old.”
“Very very great strain .amazing for the daytime will let you enjoy a nice walk on a sunny day .will elevate your mind”
“Initial heavy head high (20-30 mins) subsides to nice body high. Happy, giggly, creative, floaty. Definitely a fave.”
“This was the perfect strain for a warm smoke sesssion before some OG Kush live resin.”

“Nice smooth smoke, not something you want to smoke for watching a movies or kicking back for a series marathon but defeineyntly a strain to smoke out with mates or do get something done, even with mates a movie or series marathon would be great. Great smoke, smooth high and great buzz”
“This is one of my all time faves, this strain smells AMAZING, its fruity and sweet smelling and tastes great! It gave me a great, happy relaxing high”
“Strong sativa with a great tropical flavour, one of my favorites”
“mixed this strain with XJ-13 and music has never been so magical. smoke them together right before you go to sleep, turn on your favorite type of music or discover new music and drift away.”
“Smooth in a cigarette. relaxing body mellow”
“Relaxes my entire body with a slight tingle while leaving the mind a little spacey yet deep in thought. All the happy. Cotton mouth city.”
“I love this one.. love the taste, giggly, chill feeling.. when you're having a bad day this is the one to get you in a better mood..”
“was good bud for play, and intimacy not a drag you down to the couch smoke. long lasting smile on both our faces.”
“One of my favorite strains. I use this one for a lift. It also helps relieve pain, but not quite as well as some.”
“Loved the smell and look.  Perfect for daytime use.”

“A pleasant, tropical sativa variety. Extremely relaxing on the mind and medicinal for a sativa. The taste is fresh and fruity. Especially good for headaches. Smoked mine the second time with a little hash oil for ultra-psychoactivity”
“Loved the flavor and of course, the magnificent trip!”
“I like this strain, it works good for me for pain & helps with my depression. it melows me out & isn't harsh on my throat. It works good for day use.”

“only one word: wow
a little goes a long way...”
“not that great. burns to fast. i get stupid dizzy. but it makes me stupid happy. but i get a bad headach its not worth it.”
“This tree is one of my absolute favorites. The taste is light and fruity, that eases you into a euphoric state of energetic  bliss. Bluntly put, Its the shit.”
“Just got some more of this stuff and all I can say is probably my favorite strain of all time”
“Really nice, very trippy”
“I literally feel like I'm about to explode with knowledge. I love it.”

“Nice flavor
Nice nug smell
Decent head, less body, not overwhelming”
“Even though its not likely to be the original Maui Waui, it's a great sativa. Focus, pain relief, energetic”

“So much fun to be introduced to this inventive state of mind in which your brain runs rapidly through ideas sitting upon ideas - theorizing without end - ultimately realizing that you have spoken more than words. I long for this high.”

“my favorite strain so far! I was able to feel vibrations all over my Body, even the feeling of my phone keyboard buzz going through my hands c: 
you'll feel motivated to get out of bed and explore, amazing high :)”
“very good sweet taste, doesn't taste like weed at all. very happy”
“Fantastic smell, great uplifting high”
“One of my new favorite strains! Perfect for an after work joint. Maui Waui lifts the stress away and brings an uplifted feeling :)”
“not so strong, but tasted excellent”
“Great day strain. Smoked before work and functioned all day no problems. The tropical taste is exotic but pleasant. Overall good weed!”

“Like Hawaiian, this strain conjures images of salt spray and a warm sunset in it's enticing, relaxing effects.  Fruity on the exhale, the smoke is smooth and pleasant.  Preferred through a normal pipe, though bubblers help break through resistance.

The effects seem beguilingly mild through the lens of my very high tolerance.  This is simply a lack of awareness to the myriad effects I've noted.  Euphoria and stress r...”
“Easy going afternoon smoke”
“Huge fan of the fruity flavors and wonderful effect without making one tired”

“So I'm reading reviews of this strain and people are failing to mention a few things. This strain is REALLY GOOD, a bowl or two (or three or four) and you'll go on a trip back to Maui Waui in minutes. It's not a physical high where you feel tingly all over, but a mental high where you'll have so many thoughts you get lost in them. As for the energy boost everyone's talking about, it's a very minor one. It's more of t...”

“light nice dense buds
super live high great strain”
“Great strain! Love it for a chill afternoon!”
“Happiness/euphoria to the maximum, one of my personal fav sativa”
“Perfect end of day toke.  Stoned at 1st. Then calm energy to follow. Tastes great! ...Dabbing the GTI concentrate”
“This was amazing had it in shatter taste was perfect”

“Very good bud. Wonderful pineapple aroma. Good strength flower from my dispensary as just half a joint has me feeling quite elated. Good sativa with a nice euphoria while still calming and relaxing me. I feel like I can still focus as I'm about to attempt some stats homework. Cured my depression and increased my motivation.”
“Just learned to shuffle dance on Maui Wowie man! 😎🤓”

“This flower definitely lives upto its name. I believe this is the buzz the Zen Master Jeff Spicolli was refering to when he spoke the famous line, All I need is some tasty waves and a cool buzz and I'm fine!"”"
“Absolute wonderful gift of a strain. Nothing but pure bliss and happiness. Content with myself on a whole different level. Must try if you can get it.”
“Very uplifting and creative!”
“Good strain. Overall good effects. Gives energy, focus, and appetite for daytime. Also good for anxiety and pain.”

“frosty.
fruity smell. refreshing like an ocean breeze.
calyx to leaf ratio: 8
one hit = calming effect
two hits = creeper soaring head high”
“it sparkles in the light.its beautiful,and is the best jane ive smoked by far.buy it!”
“Although the trip was short, it was worth it.”

“Great old school feel with uplifting vibes; it's easy to see how this strain has earned its well-deserved reputation. This is in my top 3 favorite sativas as it provides a creative buzz with euphoria that helps reduce nerve pain without feeling like the Earth's gravity has been cranked up. The lighter appearance with orange-whitish hairs and the pungent smell are reminiscent of the tropics.”

“Just got a bunch of this the other day, was pretty fucking good. I have had better though, but again I was smoking various different strains of weed throughout the day so, yeah I would recommend it to people. - a stoner review”
“This a real light energetic buzz, a nice hazed look”

“I'm a rookie, but wowie! Really tropical and sweet smell and taste. Though I did cough a bit more than usual, it was definitely worth it. Very uplifting, I couldn't stop laughing. 10/10 would buy again.”
“I love it”
“my favorite strand maan maui wowie,”

“i am used to smoking heavy weed like girl scout cookies, mango dream, and various indors. but this is diffrent its a way more chilled high while still feeling like you are very high. this strain is great i recomend it.”

“Great strain! Smells almost tropical. Taste is very similar to the smell! Dense flowers. Effects are easy to come on, and very easy going. I'd recommend this to anyone with depression, pain, anxiety, or stress.”

“this strain is beautiful and delicious all around! taste great, smokes great and burns very slow when you add a string of XJ13 shatter in your blunt or joints. although maui waui is all around  awesome I can function great, focus and be productive and have that awesome relaxed mellow feeling with out the paranoia I would have to say the potency was light to moderate I had to smoke more than usual to achieve a strong ...”
“Giggles. Stupid awesome high-deas. Perfect for depression, anxiety, stress, or social smoking.”
“Was a good relaxing high. right after some mma training smoked some and didn't feel fatigued.”
“Beautiful Flower. Makes you extremely happy.”
“I have to say that this is my favorite flower, chills me out, last long, love the smell, makes me wish I was on an island.”

“My ultimate favorite strain! It never fails me. This sativa always makes me happy and sociable. I have high tolerance as well but this one always gets me. It has a delicious, fruity taste and no harshness at all.”
“what a rollercoaster, ive smoked this a few times now and everytime i get really euphoric a slight sedative and uplifted feeling,very creative and then a rush or motivation”
“Another classic strain. I love the taste of this stuff! Everyone should try this.”
“this helps my ptsd quite a bit, very relaxing, but not so much that i cant get off the couch, delicious taste and aroma, there is nothing i dont like about this one”

“A great stain for someone who is not seeking a high potency medication.  Great for depression PTSD TBI or stress. This is a nice strain to escape reality for a moment . If this strain is not properly flushed it will taste like crap and burn the back of the throat. Check your ash it should be white not grey or dark. If it is flushed its heavenly with phenotypes ranging from tropical sweet spice to a hazy peppery flavo...”

“This was my first time smoking this strain. So far, so great! I bought a half gram from Dab Society. Nice light golden brown color, 60% THC. Hits very smooth, light fruity flavor. Definitely will buy more in the future.”
“Illinois strain 21.4 % THC . Sweet citrus sativa with a great taste , perfect for the day time. I normally don't care for a sativa however this one is a definite winner”

“A very strong Sativa, you're gonna feel yourself too much sleepy after smoking this one, it's one of the best to smoke before go to sleep, you're gonna be fully relaxed, if you smoke a lot of this planing do something after you may forget, it probably will make you pass out if you smoke a big quantify, one of the most beautiful buds I've ever seem, it looks pretty much like little trees of weed full of tricome and ke...”
“Helped my anxiety without losing my energy!”

“Fantastic flower all around!!!  From the beautiful bright orange hairs that are woven throughout the just as bright green flesh. This green bud lighter than most other buds because there are so many crystal coating the surface it knocks the tone down.  Breaking apart this flavorful flower is so exciting for several reasons.  The first being texture which is perfectly even not being too dense nor fluffy and with each ...”

“Beautiful buds covered with trichomes. It has a citrus, spicy scent. The terpenes also hold those scents when smoked. Being a Sativa I usually avoid them because I like the healing and relaxation often found with Indicas or even some hybrids. For me it was a great strain to start my day with. It gave me a head high and actually seemed to make me focus better. One of my new favorites for sure!”
“This stuff has got me in the best mood and I'm smiling and laughing about absolutely nothing at half a bowl in, and not a large one at that. If I could give it more than 5 stars I would.”

“Although the effects do not last as long as I would hope, it is a great strain to help get things accomplished without becoming glued to the couch.  Great for uses in small doses, use a little bit every so often, and you'll have a productive afternoon.”

“This....makes me fall. asleep for ptolonged perods over and over....not for everyday use. Maybe save for a long relaxing weekend - dont expect to get work done after smoking, especially for all us sativa or hybrid smokers ...be aware.”

“This strain smells so good, I saved some to spark on the beach and I was just tripping on the beach pretty much - I had a great time with it, I recommend strongly. Not the most crazy high but very fun.”

“Who needs coffee when you have Maui Waui?! My favorite morning time strain. Picks me up and gives me the energy to tackle everything from yard work to hiking while having the mental clarity for paying the bills and balancing the budget.”
“You can't go wrong with Maui! A great social strain, it relieves anxiety and helps you smile through lifes daily stresses. Great for a mini vacation or road trip 💛”

“Was very first strain I've ever smoked. It was amazing! Hits you hard and makes you feel like your wearing a headband and makes you smile uncontrollably and makes you hungry. Great for depression and stress! Would recommend to anyone!”
“A good old go to when the chips are down.”
“Clear high, Head stone, no couchlock, uplifting. good smell, sweet. good day smoke, or evening unwinder.”
“Is Ok But Would Definetly Get Stonger Stuff Next Time. Doesnt Really Feel Overwhelming.”

“Probably my favorite Strain of all time Maui Waui really is an escape to the Islands of Hawaii it really makes you laid back like a day on the beach...This strain makes you feel Happy and Energetic but super creative good strain for if your up all night doing a poster for a company ;)”
